typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	in_filename as string,
	out_filename as string,
	in_extraColumn as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[($in_filename)]) ~> source1
source1 derive(newcolumn = "feyenoord") ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
